Title: Green Bombs
Desc2: All squares surrounding the character explode. Teammates standing in the exploded areas will not gain any Points. (Characters are immune to their own bombs.)

Title: Blue Bombs
Desc2: All squares diagonal to the character explode. The explosion pattern extends to the edge of the board. Teammates standing in the exploded areas will not gain any Points. (Characters are immune to their own bombs.)

Title: Yellow Bombs
Desc2: All squares in the same column and row as the character explode. The explosion pattern extends to the edge of the board. Teammates standing in the exploded areas will not gain any Points. (Characters are immune to their own bombs.)

Title: Red Tide Squares
Desc2: When a square turns red, Red Tide will appear on that square. All characters standing on that square during the Aftermath Phase will not gain any Points.

Title: Switch Track
Desc1: Slide up/down or press the arrow buttons to switch between tracks

Title: Leap
Desc1: Use skills to make the frame jump up and avoid low obstacles

Title: Slide
Desc1: Use skills to make the frame slide and avoid overhead obstacles

Title: Green Bomb
Desc2: All squares surrounding the character explode. (Characters are immune to their own bombs.)

Title: Blue Bomb
Desc2: All squares diagonal to the character explode. The explosion pattern extends to the edge of the board. (Characters are immune to their own bombs.)

Title: Yellow Bomb
Desc2: All squares in the same column and row as the character explode. The explosion pattern extends to the edge of the board. (Characters are immune to their own bombs.)

Title: Materials and Tools
Desc2: Materials and tools to make sweet dumplings, corresponding to the Material and Tool Skill Orbs in the orb bar.

Title: Production Orb Bar
Desc2: Each bowl of sweet dumplings require different materials and tools and will generate combinations of random quantities and orders. Tap the Material and Tool Skill Orbs according to the order in display.

Title: Red Skill Orb
Desc2: Shoots 1 water orb forward, which will bind a player or eliminate a bound player on hit.

Title: Blue Skill Orb
Desc2: Shoots 2 water orbs forward in a row, which will eliminate a player if they hit the same player.

Title: Yellow Skill Orb
Desc2: Gains a shield for 5s and become immune to 1 attack.

Title: Purple Skill Orb
Desc2: Generates a vortex on spot, which will pull players in it to its center.
